title: Mark Your Calendar: MWGFD- online symposium Tuesday, Feb 28, 2023
cleaned_text:
Mediziner und Wissenschaftler für Gesundheit, Freiheit und Demokratie, e.V. (MWGFD), or Physicians and Scientists for Health, Freedom and Democracy, e.V. is a German not-for-profit association that advocates freedom and democracy in research and education.

MWGFD will hold The big MWGFD- online symposium on “Gene-based vaccines/COVID vaccination – the pharmaceutical crime of the century?” Tuesday, February 28, 2023, from 6 p.m. to midnight German time (CET). Twenty renowned medical, science, and law experts will address the crucial questions regarding mRNA vaccines.

Watch the live stream in English on Oval Media:

For detailed information on the coming symposium program, please visit:
